name: Alexnava.github.io
body:
### What's this? A basic page i will use to store some experiments/hacks. Mostly they'll be about javascript and WebGL. Mind you, I'm a web programming nOOb :) `// A pointless demo with a triangle spinning.`
[GlDuh](http://alexnava.github.io/glduh) `// Threetwenty demos - slightly less pointless`
`// They use a library i'm writing for creating old-style 2D graphics`
`// Supports keyboard and touch gestures,`
`// loading bitmaps, BM fonts, shaders`
`// A sprite spinning around, fonts, a blur shader`
`// Arrow keys or swipe: change blur direction`
[320 Doge demo](http://alexnava.github.io/threetwenty/doge.html)
`// A terrain map generated from a 100x100 binary grid`
`// and generic tiles. Also, a CRT shader (looks better on big screens)`
`// Swipe (only on mobile): scrolls the map`
[320 Terrain demo](http://alexnava.github.io/threetwenty/terrain.html)
`// Experimenting with fullscreen API`
[320 Fullscreen demo](http://alexnava.github.io/threetwenty/bort.html)
note: Don't delete this file! It's used internally to help with page regeneration.
